user.title: WeConnect Configuration
user.description:
Fill in WeConnect information

S-PIN is required for some specific options such as lock/unlock and combustion engine heating start/stop

data.mutable: Disable to remove sensors that can interact with the car
data.region: Region (The country where the car was sold)
data.scandinavian_miles: Enable if you want to change from km to mil on sensors
data.name: Name your car (defaults to VIN number)

select_vehicle.title: Vehicle
select_vehicle.description: The following vehicles was found. Please select the vehicle you wish to monitor

error.cannot_connect: Could not login to Volkswagen WeConnect, please check your credentials and verify that the service is working
error.cannot_update: Could not query update from Volkswagen WeConnect
